flavorText: In the heart of Setessa, the warriors of Leina Tower defend the polis and train its daughters.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Herzen von Setessa verteidigen die Kriegerinnen des Leina-Turms die Polis und bilden deren Töchter aus.

foreignData.text:

Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+0 und verursacht Trampelschaden.

foreignData.flavorText: En el corazón de Setessa, las guerreras de la torre Leina defienden la polis y entrenan a sus hijas.

foreignData.text:

Cuando el Entrenamiento setessano entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.
La criatura encantada obtiene +1/+0 y tiene la habilidad de arrollar.

foreignData.flavorText: Au cœur de Setessa, les guerriers de la Tour de Leina protègent la polis et entraînent ses filles.

name: Setessan Training
originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Setessan Training enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample.

rulings.text: If the creature Setessan Training would enchant is an illegal target by the time the Aura spell resolves, the entire spell doesn't resolve. It won't enter the battlefield, so its ability won't trigger.

text:
Enchant creature you control
When Setessan Training enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
